# Your B2B guide   towards sustainability

All the resources on The Matcha Initiative are curated by our network of experts and volunteers.

### Explore 240+ solutions

Each category has subcategories and a suite of Best Practices that we call 'solutions'.

Explore them, pick and choose, and accelerate sustainability in your organisation!

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ec1fa9d6f5811ed09b4b2df/672f5ed9e0e15c7419024e87_1_Office-Supplies.jpg)\\
\\
**Green Office**](https://www.thematchainitiative.com/find-a-solution/green-office-general)

‍ **AlterCOP is a remote alternative to COP, keeping people informed about the happenings of COP in real-time, all without travelling across the world!**

**It is a 2-week conference to discover, learn and take action!** AlterCOP 30 will take place from 10 November to 21 November 2025. Join us!

[Join AlterCOP30](https://www.altercop.com/)

It is time to actively prepare a more sustainable future.

We create an ecosystem _of_ and _for_ individuals in their professional lives, to empower all to take action for a change benefiting all.

We meet every month for peer sharing and learning, to dig into a sustainability topic and to network.

This November, join us for AlterCOP, our 2-week event full of panels, expert talks, corporate sharing, masterclasses and workshops.

Click [here to save your place](https://www.altercop.com/)

[Join our events](https://www.altercop.com/)

**We are a not-for-profit initiative helping companies to make a step further in the sustainable and circular economy.**

We match your needs to local solutions, actionable knowledge and shared practical experiences.

‍

Facing the pressing challenge of climate change and social responsibility, we believe businesses can go further & quicker collectively.

Watch [our video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ss4f0kuKDac) for a quick understanding of what we do.
